comment._content: It is wonderful for LOC to upload these on Flickr.

comment.author: 13539555@N00
comment._content: The car in the foreground is a '29 Plymouth (first year). The other one is a '30/'31 Ford.

comment.author: 48362159@N05
comment._content: Junked cars 1940s style, a decade earlier it would be a junked 1918 Model T ford, before then a junked wagon cart. The fact the car is only 12 years and rusted up is a sign the quality of those cars wasn't that good.
